title: Test
summary: This bar chart has 10 categories on the x axis representing Games, and Number of hours watched in each Games on the y axis.
The highest category is found at League of Legends where Number of hours watched is 512.3.
The lowest category is found at World of Warcraft where Number of hours watched is 118.5.
The highest value at League of Legends is almost 4.32 times larger than the minimum value of World of Warcraft.
